name: Ultimate Moto RR 4
description:
Finally a MotoGP Game that gives an Authentic Racing Experience!

Drive your own Racing Motorbike and explore a New Gaming Way!
Attach your helmet and exceed your limits!

Not less than 7 different Game Modes:

• "CAREER": Challenge the Greatest Riders and try to win the World Championship!
• "DISCOVER": Discover different tracks and train yourself.
• "DUEL": Compete with the Best Rider!
• "TIME ATTACK": Improve your chrono! The "Ghost" of your Best Time will help you!
• "FIGHT": It must remain ONE!
• "PURSUIT": Cops want to catch you! Try to outrun them!
• "GYMKHANA": Learn to mastered your motorbike on unusual tracks!

Over than 60 Challenges on over than 20 different Tracks!

Save money to offer you the most Powerful Motorbikes never made.

Be the Best and don't forget that "Without Mastering, Power is Nothing!"

A "Tuto" mode is available on the Main Menu.
Follow the instructions and you'll be ready to face your Destiny!

Go and look in the "Options" of the Main Menu to:

• Set the Accelerometer's Sensitivity.
• Select the Difficulty Level: "Beginner", "Expert" or "Pilot".
• Select the Camera: "Outside" or "Inside".
• Enable or Disable Music.
• Set the Graphic Quality.

For each game mode, the time of all races is recorded.
Share your Best Times of the "CAREER" mode and challenge your friends with the highest scores.

Are you ready?

••• Game Features •••

• Drive your own Racing Motorbike!
• 7 Game Modes!
• More than 60 Challenges!
• Full 3D Real Time Rendering!
• High Graphic Quality!
• Challenge your friends with the highest scores!
• In Exclusivity: Music by "REVENGE"!
